name: DigitalAdvertisingMoment
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: There has simply never been a better time to be a marketer. Prospects can be reached via email, direct mail, mobile device or desktop, and with Deterministix, reaching the right prospects digitally is now a reality.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
